title: Permutation eSports Looking for Players (plat 5+)
body:
thank you to everyone who applied this week to join our first team. now we need to fill in the ranks of our second and third teams. 

we are looking for players for the following roles: top, jungle, mid and adc.

if you are interested or have any questions add me in game BurstFire303.

replies.body: Top main, added you in game
ADC main - I've added you in game ( Are you guys still looking for players? )
